item.title: IndieWebCamp NYC 2016
item.description: I’m at IndieWebCamp NYC and I just added some microformats data to my site. Hurrah! Edit: And I’ve successfully sent a Webmention by hand from the command line. Time to add that to the Jekyll build process…
